nodes.text: Star Wars: Book One is a hardcover collection of the first three volumes of the Jedi Prince young-readers series from authors Paul and Hollace Davids: The Glove of Darth Vader, The Lost City of the Jedi, and Zorba the Hutt's Revenge. It was published by Barnes & Noble Books on January 1, 1997.
Star Wars: Book Two collects the final three volumes of the Jedi Prince series: Mission from Mount Yoda, Queen of the Empire, and Prophets of the Dark Side.
